name: Founding Documents
tagline: On Monday, December 12, 2011 at 2:00 PM, a diverse group of courageous citizens announced the formation of the Justice Party
body:
_"Where justice is denied, where poverty is enforced, where ignorance prevails, and where any one class is made to feel that society is an organized conspiracy to oppress, rob and degrade them, neither persons nor property will be safe."_ â€” Frederick Douglass

The Justice Party works on its founding documents in a democratic way, on GitHub.  This page allows people to read those documents and get involved.

For more about The Justice Party, visit http://www.justicepartyusa.org/about
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
